Digitally Transforming the Dental Industry

UX Engineer at Nimbyx
Oct 2015 Jul 2016

Working on the company's flagship products, Evident Labs and Nimbyx ecosystem, I took charge of designing and developing the style guide and CSS frameworks. Handling research, wireframing, prototyping, high-fidelity mockups and user flows, I saved hours of development time, by working closely with clients to rapidly iterate on UI solutions.

I worked with an international team of developers and designers for the company's key projects: NAVGlobal, a multinational finance and wealth management app, Clockenflapp, an event app for HongKong's biggest music festival and CNNGo+Travel, CNN's answer to Netflix.
